DOC.brief_summary: To identify the effects of family work shop for children with speech developmental delays.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Work Shop for Children With Developmental Delays
DOC.detailed_description: To assess the improvement of functional performance of children with speech developmental delays by 2-3 hours per session, one session per week, a total of 6 weeks of family work shop
DOC.criteria: 18 M/O to 36 M/O of children with speech development delay less than 18 M/O older than 36 M/O
